content: this pattern has been fully tested by a wonderful group of ravelry testers working a sequence of front loop only and back loop only makes for a unique shaping yarn held double large hook size and single_crochet s throughout this works up super fast these are soft and squooshy and would make a wonderful gift very easy i would call this a easy-intermediate pattern spaaaah comfortable note you can also use bulky yarn instead of 2 strands of worsted as long as you get the same gauge also see women s sizes here ahh spa slippers 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ahh-spa-slippers
